products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede deluxe black roman blind in black. Made to measure from 15.58 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. 
  Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. 
 
All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you. 
 
Swift blinds direct are proud that their customers voteus excellent on trustpilot reviews.

products.title: Faux Suede, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede, black - roman blind the faux suede in black offers a more luxurious take on monochromatic minimalism, with its lightweight, soft-feel fabric and jet black hue, and the suppleness of the cloth means it folds gorgeously into neat roman pleats. <
products.productdescription: The faux suede in black offers a more luxurious take on monochromatic minimalism, with its lightweight, soft-feel fabric and jet black hue, and the suppleness of the cloth means it folds gorgeously into neat roman pleats. The stark shade of the black will look stunning against white walls and lime soft furnishings in a contemporary living room or home office. Keep furniture to clean, modern lines and scatter splashes of lime throughout the room. Alternatively, try with another hue, such as cobalt blue or marigold orange.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Puffin, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Puffin, black - roman blind the soft fabric of puffin black works in perfect harmony with the jet black used to catch the eye. As you look closer you'll see how the whites and browns flow into one another to create a print that is reminiscent of the chara
products.productdescription: The soft fabric of puffin black works in perfect harmony with the jet black used to catch the eye. As you look closer you'll see how the whites and browns flow into one another to create a print that is reminiscent of the characterful paintings and pictures we all love to have around the home. Add a few coastal-inspired prints to your living room to create a theme that will live long in the memory. A rope lampshade or a glass of seashells will work wonders and won't overpower the rest of your dcor. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Maurice, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Maurice, black - roman blind the pure ebony of the maurice in black provides a bold statement to an otherwise forgiving and opulent cloth. This is a modern blind made from fine, silky threads to form a grand design with a distinctive and contemporary colo
products.productdescription: The pure ebony of the maurice in black provides a bold statement to an otherwise forgiving and opulent cloth. This is a modern blind made from fine, silky threads to form a grand design with a distinctive and contemporary colour. Combine the striking black with a vibrant burst of teal or emerald for a modern look with reviving colour, forming a welcoming and cosy style by including equally elaborate fabrics with rich and restful textures. Finish off with a silver fittings and fixtures.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Basketweave, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Basketweave, black - roman blind in striking ebony, the basketweave black offers a cool, contemporary colour on a contrastingly warm, traditional fabric. The criss-cross weave and thick thread make the blind sturdy and textured, though still surprisingly
products.productdescription: In striking ebony, the basketweave black offers a cool, contemporary colour on a contrastingly warm, traditional fabric. The criss-cross weave and thick thread make the blind sturdy and textured, though still surprisingly nimble. Use the black as a more conspicuous neutral, setting it against a bright lime or cobalt blue to tame the wild shades. Either would make an impactful colour scheme for a contemporary living room or bedroom when accented with matching bedlinen, wall art, and fun ornaments. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Windsor, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Windsor, black - roman blind there's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind.
products.productdescription: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Black - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, black - roman blind for a contemporary design, with a classical finish, try the kent black. Softly stitched texturing gives it a relaxed and cosy feel, whilst the jet black shade offers a stark modern edge. The fabric falls beautifully into the soft
products.productdescription: For a contemporary design, with a classical finish, try the kent black. Softly stitched texturing gives it a relaxed and cosy feel, whilst the jet black shade offers a stark modern edge. The fabric falls beautifully into the soft curves of the blind, forming a look of character and depth.Modern style can be just as luxurious as traditional, so create a sumptuous monochrome mode in the living room by teaming the black with soft white walls, dove grey furnishings, and silver finishings. Fill the room with black and silver oddments to tie together a coordinated, coherent look. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
